page.title: 13A Day Spent with Relations
page.content: The bell of my alarm clock went off. My dog jumped on me. I looked at the clock. It said 8 o'clock. I went to have a wash. I put on my pink and white suit. I could smell bacon and eggs, but it was for my brother. I had Shreddies. We drove through the Dartford Tunnel; it cost 60p and there was a traffic jam. When I got to my cousin's, I had a Sunday lunch which was roast potatoes, beef and cabbage. My cousin and I walked to the swimming pool. It had a blue tube to slide down and water jumps. It was very good. For supper we had chicken and chips which were very tasty. I went with my cousin to see a film called Alien. I had some pop corn. Then I went home. Before I went to bed I brushed my teeth. I was very tired. It was 10 0'clock and I went straight to sleep.
